website_summaries.verdict: A redesigned, smooth roller  and wider base make this a fun, fast machine for cutting larger cardstock, and one of the best die cutters on the market.
pros: Wider than its Big Shot counterpart, with the ability to cut or emboss 8.5 x 11-inch materials
Multiple dies can be used on one task
Cardstock can be smoothly cranked through thanks to redesigned roller
cons: Platform isn’t very long, putting sandwich at risk of sagging on either end
Much larger and heavier than the smaller Big Shot model

product_meta.title: Sizzix Big Shot Plus 660340 Manual Die Cutting & Embossing Machine for Arts & Crafts, Scrapbooking & Cardmaking, 9” Opening
product_meta.description: Color:Big Shot Plus Machine OnlyBig Shot Plus, 660340 Looking for the perfect die cutting machine for card making? Why not try our our extremely popular manual machine It’s everything you love about the original Big Shot, but on a larger scale. The Sizzix Big Shot Plus machine is the perfect tool for a wide range of creative pursuits and caters for everyone from the beginner to the expert The A4 sized platform allows you to cut a variety of materials up to 9 inches wide and with just one roll through the Big Shot Plus machine, you can create a detailed and precise design to suit your creative needs. Designed with the potential to cut materials ranging from tissue to cork, as well as fabric and wood, the project possibilities are endless Compatible with the full Sizzix library including Sizzix Bigz, Thinlits, Framelits (including Plus and XL dies) as well as Embossing Folders, you can create a never-ending collection of high-end die cutting products. What's included? 1 Big Shot Plus Die Cutting Machine, 1 Platform, 1 Adapter A, 1 Adapter B and 1 Pair of Cutting Pads. What is die cutting? Die cutting is a quick and easy way of producing individual, or mass shapes from paper, foil, cardstock or even chipboard using a machine and die, instead of cutting by hand. What cuts my material? A die cutting machine will always be necessary in order to die cut, though it's not the machine itself that physically cuts your material. The die cutter you use (for example a Sizzix Bigz, Thinlits or Framelits die), is responsible for revealing your design. . . the machine just applies the pressure. So if you're ever unsure whether you can die cut a certain material, check the compatibility of your die rather than your machine
feature_bullets: MACHINE COMES WITH – 1 pair of Big Shot Plus Cutting Pads, 1 Platform, 1 Adapter A, and 1 Adapter B pad.
DIE CUTTING AND EMBOSSING - It's everything you love about the Big Shot and more with access to Sizzix Plus dies!
THE A4 SIZED OPENING - The larger platform means you can now use larger materials and dies to create bigger and better scrapbooking, paper crafting, Quilting and appliqué projects.
MULTITUDE OF MATERIALS - Cut and emboss anything from paper, tissue and cardstock to felt, cork and balsa wood up to 21cm (9") wide.
